alert.note: Alert for Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 16 at 3:16AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Brule Creek near Richland affecting Union County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Brule Creek near Richland. * WHEN...From early this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1125.0 feet, significant flooding of crop and pasture land begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 1125.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 4:00 AM CDT Thursday was 1125.4 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1125.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Brule Creek Richland 1125.0 1125.4 Thu 4 am MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 615 AM CDT.
